verses.name: Numbers 26:2
verses.text: Take the sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel, from twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers’ house, all that are able to go to war in Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 26:3
verses.text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest spake with them in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 26:4
verses.text: Take the sum of the people, from twenty years old and upward; as the Lord commanded Moses and the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Numbers 26:5
verses.text: Reuben, the eldest son of Israel: the children of Reuben; Hanoch, of whom cometh the family of the Hanochites: of Pallu, the family of the Palluites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:6
verses.text: Of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Carmi, the family of the Carmites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:7
verses.text: These are the families of the Reubenites: and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty.

verses.name: Numbers 26:8
verses.text: And the sons of Pallu; Eliab.

verses.name: Numbers 26:9
verses.text: And the sons of Eliab; Nemuel, and Dathan, and Abiram. This is that Dathan and Abiram, which were famous in the congregation, who strove against Moses and against Aaron in the company of Korah, when they strove against the Lord:

verses.name: Numbers 26:10
verses.text: And the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah, when that company died, what time the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign.

verses.name: Numbers 26:11
verses.text: Notwithstanding the children of Korah died not.

verses.name: Numbers 26:12
verses.text: The sons of Simeon after their families: of Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites: of Jamin, the family of the Jaminites: of Jachin, the family of the Jachinites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:13
verses.text: Of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites: of Shaul, the family of the Shaulites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:14
verses.text: These are the families of the Simeonites, twenty and two thousand and two hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:15
verses.text: The children of Gad after their families: of Zephon, the family of the Zephonites: of Haggi, the family of the Haggites: of Shuni, the family of the Shunites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:16
verses.text: Of Ozni, the family of the Oznites: of Eri, the family of the Erites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:17
verses.text: Of Arod, the family of the Arodites: of Areli, the family of the Arelites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:18
verses.text: These are the families of the children of Gad according to those that were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:19
verses.text: The sons of Judah were Er and Onan: and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.

verses.name: Numbers 26:20
verses.text: And the sons of Judah after their families were; of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites: of Pharez, the family of the Pharzites: of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:21
verses.text: And the sons of Pharez were; of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Hamul, the family of the Hamulites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:22
verses.text: These are the families of Judah according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and sixteen thousand and five hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:23
verses.text: Of the sons of Issachar after their families: of Tola, the family of the Tolaites: of Pua, the family of the Punites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:24
verses.text: Of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites: of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:25
verses.text: These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:26
verses.text: Of the sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Sardites: of Elon, the family of the Elonites: of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:27
verses.text: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:28
verses.text: The sons of Joseph after their families were Manasseh and Ephraim.

verses.name: Numbers 26:29
verses.text: Of the sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites: and Machir begat Gilead: of Gilead come the family of the Gileadites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:30
verses.text: These are the sons of Gilead: of Jeezer, the family of the Jeezerites: of Helek, the family of the Helekites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:31
verses.text: And of Asriel, the family of the Asrielites: and of Shechem, the family of the Shechemites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:32
verses.text: And of Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites: and of Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:33
verses.text: And Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters: and the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

verses.name: Numbers 26:34
verses.text: These are the families of Manasseh, and those that were numbered of them, fifty and two thousand and seven hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:35
verses.text: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthalhites: of Becher, the family of the Bachrites: of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:36
verses.text: And these are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:37
verses.text: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those that were numbered of them, thirty and two thousand and five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families.

verses.name: Numbers 26:38
verses.text: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:39
verses.text: Of Shupham, the family of the Shuphamites: of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:40
verses.text: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: of Ard, the family of the Ardites: and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:41
verses.text: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and six hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:42
verses.text: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.

verses.name: Numbers 26:43
verses.text: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those that were numbered of them, were threescore and four thousand and four hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:44
verses.text: Of the children of Asher after their families: of Jimna, the family of the Jimnites: of Jesui, the family of the Jesuites: of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:45
verses.text: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites: of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:46
verses.text: And the name of the daughter of Asher was Sarah.

verses.name: Numbers 26:47
verses.text: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those that were numbered of them; who were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:48
verses.text: Of the sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites: of Guni, the family of the Gunites:

verses.name: Numbers 26:49
verses.text: Of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites: of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:50
verses.text: These are the families of Naphtali according to their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and four hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 26:51
verses.text: These were the numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty.

verses.name: Numbers 26:52
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 26:53
verses.text: Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.

verses.name: Numbers 26:54
verses.text: To many thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him.

verses.name: Numbers 26:55
verses.text: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.

verses.name: Numbers 26:56
verses.text: According to the lot shall the possession thereof be divided between many and few.

verses.name: Numbers 26:57
verses.text: And these are they that were numbered of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites: of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites: of Merari, the family of the Merarites.

verses.name: Numbers 26:58
verses.text: These are the families of the Levites: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, the family of the Korathites. And Kohath begat Amram.

verses.name: Numbers 26:59
verses.text: And the name of Amram’s wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bare to Levi in Egypt: and she bare unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.

verses.name: Numbers 26:60
verses.text: And unto Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.name: Numbers 26:61
verses.text: And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 26:62
verses.text: And those that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, all males from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 26:63
verses.text: These are they that were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.

verses.name: Numbers 26:64
verses.text: But among these there was not a man of them whom Moses and Aaron the priest numbered, when they numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.

verses.name: Numbers 26:65
verses.text: For the Lord had said of them, They shall surely die in the wilderness. And there was not left a man of them, save Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.

verses.name: Numbers 27:1
verses.text: Then came the daughters of Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of Manasseh the son of Joseph: and these are the names of his daughters; Mahlah, Noah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Tirzah.

verses.name: Numbers 27:2
verses.text: And they stood before Moses, and before Eleazar the priest, and before the princes and all the congregation, by the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 27:3
verses.text: Our father died in the wilderness, and he was not in the company of them that gathered themselves together against the Lord in the company of Korah; but died in his own sin, and had no sons.

verses.name: Numbers 27:4
verses.text: Why should the name of our father be done away from among his family, because he hath no son? Give unto us therefore a possession among the brethren of our father.

verses.name: Numbers 27:5
verses.text: And Moses brought their cause before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 27:6
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 27:7
verses.text: The daughters of Zelophehad speak right: thou shalt surely give them a possession of an inheritance among their father’s brethren; and thou shalt cause the inheritance of their father to pass unto them.

verses.name: Numbers 27:8
verses.text: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a man die, and have no son, then ye shall cause his inheritance to pass unto his daughter.

verses.name: Numbers 27:9
verses.text: And if he have no daughter, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his brethren.

verses.name: Numbers 27:10
verses.text: And if he have no brethren, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his father’s brethren.

verses.name: Numbers 27:11
verses.text: And if his father have no brethren, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his kinsman that is next to him of his family, and he shall possess it: and it shall be unto the children of Israel a statute of judgment, as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 27:12
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Get thee up into this mount Abarim, and see the land which I have given unto the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 27:13
verses.text: And when thou hast seen it, thou also shalt be gathered unto thy people, as Aaron thy brother was gathered.

verses.name: Numbers 27:14
verses.text: For ye rebelled against my commandment in the desert of Zin, in the strife of the congregation, to sanctify me at the water before their eyes: that is the water of Meribah in Kadesh in the wilderness of Zin.

verses.name: Numbers 27:15
verses.text: And Moses spake unto the Lord, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 27:16
verses.text: Let the Lord, the God of the spirits of all flesh, set a man over the congregation,

verses.name: Numbers 27:17
verses.text: Which may go out before them, and which may go in before them, and which may lead them out, and which may bring them in; that the congregation of the Lord be not as sheep which have no shepherd.

verses.name: Numbers 27:18
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Take thee Joshua the son of Nun, a man in whom is the spirit, and lay thine hand upon him;

verses.name: Numbers 27:19
verses.text: And set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation; and give him a charge in their sight.

verses.name: Numbers 27:20
verses.text: And thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may be obedient.

verses.name: Numbers 27:21
verses.text: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall ask counsel for him after the judgment of Urim before the Lord: at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he, and all the children of Israel with him, even all the congregation.

verses.name: Numbers 27:22
verses.text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him: and he took Joshua, and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation:

verses.name: Numbers 27:23
verses.text: And he laid his hands upon him, and gave him a charge, as the Lord commanded by the hand of Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 28:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 28:2
verses.text: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

verses.name: Numbers 28:3
verses.text: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the Lord; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:4
verses.text: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;

verses.name: Numbers 28:5
verses.text: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.

verses.name: Numbers 28:6
verses.text: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 28:7
verses.text: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the Lord for a drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:8
verses.text: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 28:9
verses.text: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

verses.name: Numbers 28:10
verses.text: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:11
verses.text: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the Lord; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

verses.name: Numbers 28:12
verses.text: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

verses.name: Numbers 28:13
verses.text: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 28:14
verses.text: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

verses.name: Numbers 28:15
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the Lord shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:16
verses.text: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 28:17
verses.text: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

verses.name: Numbers 28:18
verses.text: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:

verses.name: Numbers 28:19
verses.text: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the Lord; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 28:20
verses.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

verses.name: Numbers 28:21
verses.text: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

verses.name: Numbers 28:22
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

verses.name: Numbers 28:23
verses.text: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:24
verses.text: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:25
verses.text: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

verses.name: Numbers 28:26
verses.text: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the Lord, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

verses.name: Numbers 28:27
verses.text: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the Lord; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

verses.name: Numbers 28:28
verses.text: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,

verses.name: Numbers 28:29
verses.text: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

verses.name: Numbers 28:30
verses.text: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

verses.name: Numbers 28:31
verses.text: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.

verses.name: Numbers 29:1
verses.text: And in the seventh month, on the first day of the month, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work: it is a day of blowing the trumpets unto you.

verses.name: Numbers 29:2
verses.text: And ye shall offer a burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the Lord; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:3
verses.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram,

verses.name: Numbers 29:4
verses.text: And one tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

verses.name: Numbers 29:5
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you:

verses.name: Numbers 29:6
verses.text: Beside the burnt offering of the month, and his meat offering, and the daily burnt offering, and his meat offering, and their drink offerings, according unto their manner, for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 29:7
verses.text: And ye shall have on the tenth day of this seventh month an holy convocation; and ye shall afflict your souls: ye shall not do any work therein:

verses.name: Numbers 29:8
verses.text: But ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the Lord for a sweet savour; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year; they shall be unto you without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:9
verses.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals to a bullock, and two tenth deals to one ram,

verses.name: Numbers 29:10
verses.text: A several tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

verses.name: Numbers 29:11
verses.text: One kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the sin offering of atonement, and the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering of it, and their drink offerings.

verses.name: Numbers 29:12
verses.text: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work, and ye shall keep a feast unto the Lord seven days:

verses.name: Numbers 29:13
verses.text: And ye shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord; thirteen young bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year; they shall be without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:14
verses.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto every bullock of the thirteen bullocks, two tenth deals to each ram of the two rams,

verses.name: Numbers 29:15
verses.text: And a several tenth deal to each lamb of the fourteen lambs:

verses.name: Numbers 29:16
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:17
verses.text: And on the second day ye shall offer twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:

verses.name: Numbers 29:18
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:19
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering thereof, and their drink offerings.

verses.name: Numbers 29:20
verses.text: And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish;

verses.name: Numbers 29:21
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:22
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:23
verses.text: And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:24
verses.text: Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:25
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:26
verses.text: And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:

verses.name: Numbers 29:27
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:28
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:29
verses.text: And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:30
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:31
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:32
verses.text: And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:33
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:34
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:35
verses.text: On the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: ye shall do no servile work therein:

verses.name: Numbers 29:36
verses.text: But ye shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord: one bullock, one ram, seven lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:37
verses.text: Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:38
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:39
verses.text: These things ye shall do unto the Lord in your set feasts, beside your vows, and your freewill offerings, for your burnt offerings, and for your meat offerings, and for your drink offerings, and for your peace offerings.

verses.name: Numbers 29:40
verses.text: And Moses told the children of Israel according to all that the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 30:1
verses.text: And Moses spake unto the heads of the tribes concerning the children of Israel, saying, This is the thing which the Lord hath commanded.

verses.name: Numbers 30:2
verses.text: If a man vow a vow unto the Lord, or swear an oath to bind his soul with a bond; he shall not break his word, he shall do according to all that proceedeth out of his mouth.

verses.name: Numbers 30:3
verses.text: If a woman also vow a vow unto the Lord, and bind herself by a bond, being in her father’s house in her youth;

verses.name: Numbers 30:4
verses.text: And her father hear her vow, and her bond wherewith she hath bound her soul, and her father shall hold his peace at her: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond wherewith she hath bound her soul shall stand.

verses.name: Numbers 30:5
verses.text: But if her father disallow her in the day that he heareth; not any of her vows, or of her bonds wherewith she hath bound her soul, shall stand: and the Lord shall forgive her, because her father disallowed her.

verses.name: Numbers 30:6
verses.text: And if she had at all an husband, when she vowed, or uttered ought out of her lips, wherewith she bound her soul;

verses.name: Numbers 30:7
verses.text: And her husband heard it, and held his peace at her in the day that he heard it: then her vows shall stand, and her bonds wherewith she bound her soul shall stand.

verses.name: Numbers 30:8
verses.text: But if her husband disallowed her on the day that he heard it; then he shall make her vow which she vowed, and that which she uttered with her lips, wherewith she bound her soul, of none effect: and the Lord shall forgive her.

verses.name: Numbers 30:9
verses.text: But every vow of a widow, and of her that is divorced, wherewith they have bound their souls, shall stand against her.

verses.name: Numbers 30:10
verses.text: And if she vowed in her husband’s house, or bound her soul by a bond with an oath;

verses.name: Numbers 30:11
verses.text: And her husband heard it, and held his peace at her, and disallowed her not: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond wherewith she bound her soul shall stand.

verses.name: Numbers 30:12
verses.text: But if her husband hath utterly made them void on the day he heard them; then whatsoever proceeded out of her lips concerning her vows, or concerning the bond of her soul, shall not stand: her husband hath made them void; and the Lord shall forgive her.

verses.name: Numbers 30:13
verses.text: Every vow, and every binding oath to afflict the soul, her husband may establish it, or her husband may make it void.

verses.name: Numbers 30:14
verses.text: But if her husband altogether hold his peace at her from day to day; then he establisheth all her vows, or all her bonds, which are upon her: he confirmeth them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard them.

verses.name: Numbers 30:15
verses.text: But if he shall any ways make them void after that he hath heard them; then he shall bear her iniquity.

verses.name: Numbers 30:16
verses.text: These are the statutes, which the Lord commanded Moses, between a man and his wife, between the father and his daughter, being yet in her youth in her father’s house.

verses.name: Numbers 31:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 31:2
verses.text: Avenge the children of Israel of the Midianites: afterward shalt thou be gathered unto thy people.

verses.name: Numbers 31:3
verses.text: And Moses spake unto the people, saying, Arm some of yourselves unto the war, and let them go against the Midianites, and avenge the Lord of Midian.

verses.name: Numbers 31:4
verses.text: Of every tribe a thousand, throughout all the tribes of Israel, shall ye send to the war.

verses.name: Numbers 31:5
verses.text: So there were delivered out of the thousands of Israel, a thousand of every tribe, twelve thousand armed for war.

verses.name: Numbers 31:6
verses.text: And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand of every tribe, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the war, with the holy instruments, and the trumpets to blow in his hand.

verses.name: Numbers 31:7
verses.text: And they warred against the Midianites, as the Lord commanded Moses; and they slew all the males.

verses.name: Numbers 31:8
verses.text: And they slew the kings of Midian, beside the rest of them that were slain; namely, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, five kings of Midian: Balaam also the son of Beor they slew with the sword.

verses.name: Numbers 31:9
verses.text: And the children of Israel took all the women of Midian captives, and their little ones, and took the spoil of all their cattle, and all their flocks, and all their goods.

verses.name: Numbers 31:10
verses.text: And they burnt all their cities wherein they dwelt, and all their goodly castles, with fire.

verses.name: Numbers 31:11
verses.text: And they took all the spoil, and all the prey, both of men and of beasts.

verses.name: Numbers 31:12
verses.text: And they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil, unto Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and unto the congregation of the children of Israel, unto the camp at the plains of Moab, which are by Jordan near Jericho.

verses.name: Numbers 31:13
verses.text: And Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and all the princes of the congregation, went forth to meet them without the camp.

verses.name: Numbers 31:14
verses.text: And Moses was wroth with the officers of the host, with the captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, which came from the battle.

verses.name: Numbers 31:15
verses.text: And Moses said unto them, Have ye saved all the women alive?

verses.name: Numbers 31:16
verses.text: Behold, these caused the children of Israel, through the counsel of Balaam, to commit trespass against the Lord in the matter of Peor, and there was a plague among the congregation of the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 31:17
verses.text: Now therefore kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman that hath known man by lying with him.

verses.name: Numbers 31:18
verses.text: But all the women children, that have not known a man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves.

verses.name: Numbers 31:19
verses.text: And do ye abide without the camp seven days: whosoever hath killed any person, and whosoever hath touched any slain, purify both yourselves and your captives on the third day, and on the seventh day.

verses.name: Numbers 31:20
verses.text: And purify all your raiment, and all that is made of skins, and all work of goats’ hair, and all things made of wood.

verses.name: Numbers 31:21
verses.text: And Eleazar the priest said unto the men of war which went to the battle, This is the ordinance of the law which the Lord commanded Moses;

verses.name: Numbers 31:22
verses.text: Only the gold, and the silver, the brass, the iron, the tin, and the lead,

verses.name: Numbers 31:23
verses.text: Every thing that may abide the fire, ye shall make it go through the fire, and it shall be clean: nevertheless it shall be purified with the water of separation: and all that abideth not the fire ye shall make go through the water.

verses.name: Numbers 31:24
verses.text: And ye shall wash your clothes on the seventh day, and ye shall be clean, and afterward ye shall come into the camp.

verses.name: Numbers 31:25
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 31:26
verses.text: Take the sum of the prey that was taken, both of man and of beast, thou, and Eleazar the priest, and the chief fathers of the congregation:

verses.name: Numbers 31:27
verses.text: And divide the prey into two parts; between them that took the war upon them, who went out to battle, and between all the congregation:

verses.name: Numbers 31:28
verses.text: And levy a tribute unto the Lord of the men of war which went out to battle: one soul of five hundred, both of the persons, and of the beeves, and of the asses, and of the sheep:

verses.name: Numbers 31:29
verses.text: Take it of their half, and give it unto Eleazar the priest, for an heave offering of the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 31:30
verses.text: And of the children of Israel’s half, thou shalt take one portion of fifty, of the persons, of the beeves, of the asses, and of the flocks, of all manner of beasts, and give them unto the Levites, which keep the charge of the tabernacle of the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 31:31
verses.text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest did as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 31:32
verses.text: And the booty, being the rest of the prey which the men of war had caught, was six hundred thousand and seventy thousand and five thousand sheep,

verses.name: Numbers 31:33
verses.text: And threescore and twelve thousand beeves,

verses.name: Numbers 31:34
verses.text: And threescore and one thousand asses,

verses.name: Numbers 31:35
verses.text: And thirty and two thousand persons in all, of women that had not known man by lying with him.

verses.name: Numbers 31:36
verses.text: And the half, which was the portion of them that went out to war, was in number three hundred thousand and seven and thirty thousand and five hundred sheep:

verses.name: Numbers 31:37
verses.text: And the Lord’s tribute of the sheep was six hundred and threescore and fifteen.

verses.name: Numbers 31:38
verses.text: And the beeves were thirty and six thousand; of which the Lord’s tribute was threescore and twelve.

verses.name: Numbers 31:39
verses.text: And the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred; of which the Lord’s tribute was threescore and one.

verses.name: Numbers 31:40
verses.text: And the persons were sixteen thousand; of which the Lord’s tribute was thirty and two persons.

verses.name: Numbers 31:41
verses.text: And Moses gave the tribute, which was the Lord’s heave offering, unto Eleazar the priest, as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 31:42
verses.text: And of the children of Israel’s half, which Moses divided from the men that warred,

verses.name: Numbers 31:43
verses.text: (Now the half that pertained unto the congregation was three hundred thousand and thirty thousand and seven thousand and five hundred sheep,

verses.name: Numbers 31:44
verses.text: And thirty and six thousand beeves,

verses.name: Numbers 31:45
verses.text: And thirty thousand asses and five hundred,

verses.name: Numbers 31:46
verses.text: And sixteen thousand persons;)

verses.name: Numbers 31:47
verses.text: Even of the children of Israel’s half, Moses took one portion of fifty, both of man and of beast, and gave them unto the Levites, which kept the charge of the tabernacle of the Lord; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 31:48
verses.text: And the officers which were over thousands of the host, the captains of thousands, and captains of hundreds, came near unto Moses:

verses.name: Numbers 31:49
verses.text: And they said unto Moses, Thy servants have taken the sum of the men of war which are under our charge, and there lacketh not one man of us.

verses.name: Numbers 31:50
verses.text: We have therefore brought an oblation for the Lord, what every man hath gotten, of jewels of gold, chains, and bracelets, rings, earrings, and tablets, to make an atonement for our souls before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 31:51
verses.text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of them, even all wrought jewels.

verses.name: Numbers 31:52
verses.text: And all the gold of the offering that they offered up to the Lord, of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekels.

verses.name: Numbers 31:53
verses.text: (For the men of war had taken spoil, every man for himself.)

verses.name: Numbers 31:54
verses.text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the tabernacle of the congregation, for a memorial for the children of Israel before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 32:1
verses.text: Now the children of Reuben and the children of Gad had a very great multitude of cattle: and when they saw the land of Jazer, and the land of Gilead, that, behold, the place was a place for cattle;

verses.name: Numbers 32:2
verses.text: The children of Gad and the children of Reuben came and spake unto Moses, and to Eleazar the priest, and unto the princes of the congregation, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 32:3
verses.text: Ataroth, and Dibon, and Jazer, and Nimrah, and Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Shebam, and Nebo, and Beon,

verses.name: Numbers 32:4
verses.text: Even the country which the Lord smote before the congregation of Israel, is a land for cattle, and thy servants have cattle:

verses.name: Numbers 32:5
verses.text: Wherefore, said they, if we have found grace in thy sight, let this land be given unto thy servants for a possession, and bring us not over Jordan.

verses.name: Numbers 32:6
verses.text: And Moses said unto the children of Gad and to the children of Reuben, Shall your brethren go to war, and shall ye sit here?

verses.name: Numbers 32:7
verses.text: And wherefore discourage ye the heart of the children of Israel from going over into the land which the Lord hath given them?

verses.name: Numbers 32:8
verses.text: Thus did your fathers, when I sent them from Kadesh–barnea to see the land.

verses.name: Numbers 32:9
verses.text: For when they went up unto the valley of Eshcol, and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of the children of Israel, that they should not go into the land which the Lord had given them.

verses.name: Numbers 32:10
verses.text: And the Lord’s anger was kindled the same time, and he sware, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 32:11
verses.text: Surely none of the men that came up out of Egypt, from twenty years old and upward, shall see the land which I sware unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob; because they have not wholly followed me:

verses.name: Numbers 32:12
verses.text: Save Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite, and Joshua the son of Nun: for they have wholly followed the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 32:13
verses.text: And the Lord’s anger was kindled against Israel, and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation, that had done evil in the sight of the Lord, was consumed.

verses.name: Numbers 32:14
verses.text: And, behold, ye are risen up in your fathers’ stead, an increase of sinful men, to augment yet the fierce anger of the Lord toward Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 32:15
verses.text: For if ye turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the wilderness; and ye shall destroy all this people.

verses.name: Numbers 32:16
verses.text: And they came near unto him, and said, We will build sheepfolds here for our cattle, and cities for our little ones:

verses.name: Numbers 32:17
verses.text: But we ourselves will go ready armed before the children of Israel, until we have brought them unto their place: and our little ones shall dwell in the fenced cities because of the inhabitants of the land.

verses.name: Numbers 32:18
verses.text: We will not return unto our houses, until the children of Israel have inherited every man his inheritance.

verses.name: Numbers 32:19
verses.text: For we will not inherit with them on yonder side Jordan, or forward; because our inheritance is fallen to us on this side Jordan eastward.

verses.name: Numbers 32:20
verses.text: And Moses said unto them, If ye will do this thing, if ye will go armed before the Lord to war,

verses.name: Numbers 32:21
verses.text: And will go all of you armed over Jordan before the Lord, until he hath driven out his enemies from before him,

verses.name: Numbers 32:22
verses.text: And the land be subdued before the Lord: then afterward ye shall return, and be guiltless before the Lord, and before Israel; and this land shall be your possession before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 32:23
verses.text: But if ye will not do so, behold, ye have sinned against the Lord: and be sure your sin will find you out.

verses.name: Numbers 32:24
verses.text: Build you cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which hath proceeded out of your mouth.

verses.name: Numbers 32:25
verses.text: And the children of Gad and the children of Reuben spake unto Moses, saying, Thy servants will do as my lord commandeth.

verses.name: Numbers 32:26
verses.text: Our little ones, our wives, our flocks, and all our cattle, shall be there in the cities of Gilead:

verses.name: Numbers 32:27
verses.text: But thy servants will pass over, every man armed for war, before the Lord to battle, as my lord saith.

verses.name: Numbers 32:28
verses.text: So concerning them Moses commanded Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the chief fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel:

verses.name: Numbers 32:29
verses.text: And Moses said unto them, If the children of Gad and the children of Reuben will pass with you over Jordan, every man armed to battle, before the Lord, and the land shall be subdued before you; then ye shall give them the land of Gilead for a possession:

verses.name: Numbers 32:30
verses.text: But if they will not pass over with you armed, they shall have possessions among you in the land of Canaan.

verses.name: Numbers 32:31
verses.text: And the children of Gad and the children of Reuben answered, saying, As the Lord hath said unto thy servants, so will we do.

verses.name: Numbers 32:32
verses.text: We will pass over armed before the Lord into the land of Canaan, that the possession of our inheritance on this side Jordan may be ours.

verses.name: Numbers 32:33
verses.text: And Moses gave unto them, even to the children of Gad, and to the children of Reuben, and unto half the tribe of Manasseh the son of Joseph, the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, and the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, the land, with the cities thereof in the coasts, even the cities of the country round about.

verses.name: Numbers 32:34
verses.text: And the children of Gad built Dibon, and Ataroth, and Aroer,

verses.name: Numbers 32:35
verses.text: And Atroth, Shophan, and Jaazer, and Jogbehah,

verses.name: Numbers 32:36
verses.text: And Beth–nimrah, and Beth–haran, fenced cities: and folds for sheep.

verses.name: Numbers 32:37
verses.text: And the children of Reuben built Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Kirjathaim,

verses.name: Numbers 32:38
verses.text: And Nebo, and Baal–meon, (their names being changed,) and Shibmah: and gave other names unto the cities which they builded.

verses.name: Numbers 32:39
verses.text: And the children of Machir the son of Manasseh went to Gilead, and took it, and dispossessed the Amorite which was in it.

verses.name: Numbers 32:40
verses.text: And Moses gave Gilead unto Machir the son of Manasseh; and he dwelt therein.

verses.name: Numbers 32:41
verses.text: And Jair the son of Manasseh went and took the small towns thereof, and called them Havoth–jair.

verses.name: Numbers 32:42
verses.text: And Nobah went and took Kenath, and the villages thereof, and called it Nobah, after his own name.

verses.name: Numbers 33:1
verses.text: These are the journeys of the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt with their armies under the hand of Moses and Aaron.

verses.name: Numbers 33:2
verses.text: And Moses wrote their goings out according to their journeys by the commandment of the Lord: and these are their journeys according to their goings out.

verses.name: Numbers 33:3
verses.text: And they departed from Rameses in the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month; on the morrow after the passover the children of Israel went out with an high hand in the sight of all the Egyptians.

verses.name: Numbers 33:4
verses.text: For the Egyptians buried all their firstborn, which the Lord had smitten among them: upon their gods also the Lord executed judgments.

verses.name: Numbers 33:5
verses.text: And the children of Israel removed from Rameses, and pitched in Succoth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:6
verses.text: And they departed from Succoth, and pitched in Etham, which is in the edge of the wilderness.

verses.name: Numbers 33:7
verses.text: And they removed from Etham, and turned again unto Pi–hahiroth, which is before Baal–zephon: and they pitched before Migdol.

verses.name: Numbers 33:8
verses.text: And they departed from before Pi–hahiroth, and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness, and went three days’ journey in the wilderness of Etham, and pitched in Marah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:9
verses.text: And they removed from Marah, and came unto Elim: and in Elim were twelve fountains of water, and threescore and ten palm trees; and they pitched there.

verses.name: Numbers 33:10
verses.text: And they removed from Elim, and encamped by the Red sea.

verses.name: Numbers 33:11
verses.text: And they removed from the Red sea, and encamped in the wilderness of Sin.

verses.name: Numbers 33:12
verses.text: And they took their journey out of the wilderness of Sin, and encamped in Dophkah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:13
verses.text: And they departed from Dophkah, and encamped in Alush.

verses.name: Numbers 33:14
verses.text: And they removed from Alush, and encamped at Rephidim, where was no water for the people to drink.

verses.name: Numbers 33:15
verses.text: And they departed from Rephidim, and pitched in the wilderness of Sinai.

verses.name: Numbers 33:16
verses.text: And they removed from the desert of Sinai, and pitched at Kibroth–hattaavah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:17
verses.text: And they departed from Kibroth–hattaavah, and encamped at Hazeroth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:18
verses.text: And they departed from Hazeroth, and pitched in Rithmah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:19
verses.text: And they departed from Rithmah, and pitched at Rimmon–parez.

verses.name: Numbers 33:20
verses.text: And they departed from Rimmon–parez, and pitched in Libnah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:21
verses.text: And they removed from Libnah, and pitched at Rissah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:22
verses.text: And they journeyed from Rissah, and pitched in Kehelathah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:23
verses.text: And they went from Kehelathah, and pitched in mount Shapher.

verses.name: Numbers 33:24
verses.text: And they removed from mount Shapher, and encamped in Haradah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:25
verses.text: And they removed from Haradah, and pitched in Makheloth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:26
verses.text: And they removed from Makheloth, and encamped at Tahath.

verses.name: Numbers 33:27
verses.text: And they departed from Tahath, and pitched at Tarah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:28
verses.text: And they removed from Tarah, and pitched in Mithcah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:29
verses.text: And they went from Mithcah, and pitched in Hashmonah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:30
verses.text: And they departed from Hashmonah, and encamped at Moseroth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:31
verses.text: And they departed from Moseroth, and pitched in Bene–jaakan.

verses.name: Numbers 33:32
verses.text: And they removed from Bene–jaakan, and encamped at Hor–hagidgad.

verses.name: Numbers 33:33
verses.text: And they went from Hor–hagidgad, and pitched in Jotbathah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:34
verses.text: And they removed from Jotbathah, and encamped at Ebronah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:35
verses.text: And they departed from Ebronah, and encamped at Ezion–gaber.

verses.name: Numbers 33:36
verses.text: And they removed from Ezion–gaber, and pitched in the wilderness of Zin, which is Kadesh.

verses.name: Numbers 33:37
verses.text: And they removed from Kadesh, and pitched in mount Hor, in the edge of the land of Edom.

verses.name: Numbers 33:38
verses.text: And Aaron the priest went up into mount Hor at the commandment of the Lord, and died there, in the fortieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt, in the first day of the fifth month.

verses.name: Numbers 33:39
verses.text: And Aaron was an hundred and twenty and three years old when he died in mount Hor.

verses.name: Numbers 33:40
verses.text: And king Arad the Canaanite, which dwelt in the south in the land of Canaan, heard of the coming of the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 33:41
verses.text: And they departed from mount Hor, and pitched in Zalmonah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:42
verses.text: And they departed from Zalmonah, and pitched in Punon.

verses.name: Numbers 33:43
verses.text: And they departed from Punon, and pitched in Oboth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:44
verses.text: And they departed from Oboth, and pitched in Ije–abarim, in the border of Moab.

verses.name: Numbers 33:45
verses.text: And they departed from Iim, and pitched in Dibon–gad.

verses.name: Numbers 33:46
verses.text: And they removed from Dibon–gad, and encamped in Almon–diblathaim.

verses.name: Numbers 33:47
verses.text: And they removed from Almon–diblathaim, and pitched in the mountains of Abarim, before Nebo.

verses.name: Numbers 33:48
verses.text: And they departed from the mountains of Abarim, and pitched in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.

verses.name: Numbers 33:49
verses.text: And they pitched by Jordan, from Beth–jesimoth even unto Abel–shittim in the plains of Moab.

verses.name: Numbers 33:50
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 33:51
verses.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When ye are passed over Jordan into the land of Canaan;

verses.name: Numbers 33:52
verses.text: Then ye shall drive out all the inhabitants of the land from before you, and destroy all their pictures, and destroy all their molten images, and quite pluck down all their high places:

verses.name: Numbers 33:53
verses.text: And ye shall dispossess the inhabitants of the land, and dwell therein: for I have given you the land to possess it.

verses.name: Numbers 33:54
verses.text: And ye shall divide the land by lot for an inheritance among your families: and to the more ye shall give the more inheritance, and to the fewer ye shall give the less inheritance: every man’s inheritance shall be in the place where his lot falleth; according to the tribes of your fathers ye shall inherit.

verses.name: Numbers 33:55
verses.text: But if ye will not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before you; then it shall come to pass, that those which ye let remain of them shall be pricks in your eyes, and thorns in your sides, and shall vex you in the land wherein ye dwell.

verses.name: Numbers 33:56
verses.text: Moreover it shall come to pass, that I shall do unto you, as I thought to do unto them.

verses.name: Numbers 34:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 34:2
verses.text: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, When ye come into the land of Canaan; (this is the land that shall fall unto you for an inheritance, even the land of Canaan with the coasts thereof:)

verses.name: Numbers 34:3
verses.text: Then your south quarter shall be from the wilderness of Zin along by the coast of Edom, and your south border shall be the outmost coast of the salt sea eastward:

verses.name: Numbers 34:4
verses.text: And your border shall turn from the south to the ascent of Akrabbim, and pass on to Zin: and the going forth thereof shall be from the south to Kadesh–barnea, and shall go on to Hazar–addar, and pass on to Azmon:

verses.name: Numbers 34:5
verses.text: And the border shall fetch a compass from Azmon unto the river of Egypt, and the goings out of it shall be at the sea.

verses.name: Numbers 34:6
verses.text: And as for the western border, ye shall even have the great sea for a border: this shall be your west border.

verses.name: Numbers 34:7
verses.text: And this shall be your north border: from the great sea ye shall point out for you mount Hor:

verses.name: Numbers 34:8
verses.text: From mount Hor ye shall point out your border unto the entrance of Hamath; and the goings forth of the border shall be to Zedad:

verses.name: Numbers 34:9
verses.text: And the border shall go on to Ziphron, and the goings out of it shall be at Hazar–enan: this shall be your north border.

verses.name: Numbers 34:10
verses.text: And ye shall point out your east border from Hazar–enan to Shepham:

verses.name: Numbers 34:11
verses.text: And the coast shall go down from Shepham to Riblah, on the east side of Ain; and the border shall descend, and shall reach unto the side of the sea of Chinnereth eastward:

verses.name: Numbers 34:12
verses.text: And the border shall go down to Jordan, and the goings out of it shall be at the salt sea: this shall be your land with the coasts thereof round about.

verses.name: Numbers 34:13
verses.text: And Moses commanded the children of Israel, saying, This is the land which ye shall inherit by lot, which the Lord commanded to give unto the nine tribes, and to the half tribe:

verses.name: Numbers 34:14
verses.text: For the tribe of the children of Reuben according to the house of their fathers, and the tribe of the children of Gad according to the house of their fathers, have received their inheritance; and half the tribe of Manasseh have received their inheritance:

verses.name: Numbers 34:15
verses.text: The two tribes and the half tribe have received their inheritance on this side Jordan near Jericho eastward, toward the sunrising.

verses.name: Numbers 34:16
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 34:17
verses.text: These are the names of the men which shall divide the land unto you: Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun.

verses.name: Numbers 34:18
verses.text: And ye shall take one prince of every tribe, to divide the land by inheritance.

verses.name: Numbers 34:19
verses.text: And the names of the men are these: Of the tribe of Judah, Caleb the son of Jephunneh.

verses.name: Numbers 34:20
verses.text: And of the tribe of the children of Simeon, Shemuel the son of Ammihud.

verses.name: Numbers 34:21
verses.text: Of the tribe of Benjamin, Elidad the son of Chislon.

verses.name: Numbers 34:22
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Dan, Bukki the son of Jogli.

verses.name: Numbers 34:23
verses.text: The prince of the children of Joseph, for the tribe of the children of Manasseh, Hanniel the son of Ephod.

verses.name: Numbers 34:24
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Ephraim, Kemuel the son of Shiphtan.

verses.name: Numbers 34:25
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Zebulun, Elizaphan the son of Parnach.

verses.name: Numbers 34:26
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Issachar, Paltiel the son of Azzan.

verses.name: Numbers 34:27
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Asher, Ahihud the son of Shelomi.

verses.name: Numbers 34:28
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Naphtali, Pedahel the son of Ammihud.

verses.name: Numbers 34:29
verses.text: These are they whom the Lord commanded to divide the inheritance unto the children of Israel in the land of Canaan.

verses.name: Numbers 35:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 35:2
verses.text: Command the children of Israel, that they give unto the Levites of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and ye shall give also unto the Levites suburbs for the cities round about them.

verses.name: Numbers 35:3
verses.text: And the cities shall they have to dwell in; and the suburbs of them shall be for their cattle, and for their goods, and for all their beasts.

verses.name: Numbers 35:4
verses.text: And the suburbs of the cities, which ye shall give unto the Levites, shall reach from the wall of the city and outward a thousand cubits round about.

verses.name: Numbers 35:5
verses.text: And ye shall measure from without the city on the east side two thousand cubits, and on the south side two thousand cubits, and on the west side two thousand cubits, and on the north side two thousand cubits; and the city shall be in the midst: this shall be to them the suburbs of the cities.

verses.name: Numbers 35:6
verses.text: And among the cities which ye shall give unto the Levites there shall be six cities for refuge, which ye shall appoint for the manslayer, that he may flee thither: and to them ye shall add forty and two cities.

verses.name: Numbers 35:7
verses.text: So all the cities which ye shall give to the Levites shall be forty and eight cities: them shall ye give with their suburbs.

verses.name: Numbers 35:8
verses.text: And the cities which ye shall give shall be of the possession of the children of Israel: from them that have many ye shall give many; but from them that have few ye shall give few: every one shall give of his cities unto the Levites according to his inheritance which he inheriteth.

verses.name: Numbers 35:9
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 35:10
verses.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When ye be come over Jordan into the land of Canaan;

verses.name: Numbers 35:11
verses.text: Then ye shall appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee thither, which killeth any person at unawares.

verses.name: Numbers 35:12
verses.text: And they shall be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before the congregation in judgment.

verses.name: Numbers 35:13
verses.text: And of these cities which ye shall give six cities shall ye have for refuge.

verses.name: Numbers 35:14
verses.text: Ye shall give three cities on this side Jordan, and three cities shall ye give in the land of Canaan, which shall be cities of refuge.

verses.name: Numbers 35:15
verses.text: These six cities shall be a refuge, both for the children of Israel, and for the stranger, and for the sojourner among them: that every one that killeth any person unawares may flee thither.

verses.name: Numbers 35:16
verses.text: And if he smite him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

verses.name: Numbers 35:17
verses.text: And if he smite him with throwing a stone, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

verses.name: Numbers 35:18
verses.text: Or if he smite him with an hand weapon of wood, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

verses.name: Numbers 35:19
verses.text: The revenger of blood himself shall slay the murderer: when he meeteth him, he shall slay him.

verses.name: Numbers 35:20
verses.text: But if he thrust him of hatred, or hurl at him by laying of wait, that he die;

verses.name: Numbers 35:21
verses.text: Or in enmity smite him with his hand, that he die: he that smote him shall surely be put to death; for he is a murderer: the revenger of blood shall slay the murderer, when he meeteth him.

verses.name: Numbers 35:22
verses.text: But if he thrust him suddenly without enmity, or have cast upon him any thing without laying of wait,

verses.name: Numbers 35:23
verses.text: Or with any stone, wherewith a man may die, seeing him not, and cast it upon him, that he die, and was not his enemy, neither sought his harm:

verses.name: Numbers 35:24
verses.text: Then the congregation shall judge between the slayer and the revenger of blood according to these judgments:

verses.name: Numbers 35:25
verses.text: And the congregation shall deliver the slayer out of the hand of the revenger of blood, and the congregation shall restore him to the city of his refuge, whither he was fled: and he shall abide in it unto the death of the high priest, which was anointed with the holy oil.

verses.name: Numbers 35:26
verses.text: But if the slayer shall at any time come without the border of the city of his refuge, whither he was fled;

verses.name: Numbers 35:27
verses.text: And the revenger of blood find him without the borders of the city of his refuge, and the revenger of blood kill the slayer; he shall not be guilty of blood:

verses.name: Numbers 35:28
verses.text: Because he should have remained in the city of his refuge until the death of the high priest: but after the death of the high priest the slayer shall return into the land of his possession.

verses.name: Numbers 35:29
verses.text: So these things shall be for a statute of judgment unto you throughout your generations in all your dwellings.

verses.name: Numbers 35:30
verses.text: Whoso killeth any person, the murderer shall be put to death by the mouth of witnesses: but one witness shall not testify against any person to cause him to die.

verses.name: Numbers 35:31
verses.text: Moreover ye shall take no satisfaction for the life of a murderer, which is guilty of death: but he shall be surely put to death.

verses.name: Numbers 35:32
verses.text: And ye shall take no satisfaction for him that is fled to the city of his refuge, that he should come again to dwell in the land, until the death of the priest.

verses.name: Numbers 35:33
verses.text: So ye shall not pollute the land wherein ye are: for blood it defileth the land: and the land cannot be cleansed of the blood that is shed therein, but by the blood of him that shed it.

verses.name: Numbers 35:34
verses.text: Defile not therefore the land which ye shall inhabit, wherein I dwell: for I the Lord dwell among the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 36:1
verses.text: And the chief fathers of the families of the children of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of the sons of Joseph, came near, and spake before Moses, and before the princes, the chief fathers of the children of Israel:

verses.name: Numbers 36:2
verses.text: And they said, The Lord commanded my lord to give the land for an inheritance by lot to the children of Israel: and my lord was commanded by the Lord to give the inheritance of Zelophehad our brother unto his daughters.

verses.name: Numbers 36:3
verses.text: And if they be married to any of the sons of the other tribes of the children of Israel, then shall their inheritance be taken from the inheritance of our fathers, and shall be put to the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they are received: so shall it be taken from the lot of our inheritance.

verses.name: Numbers 36:4
verses.text: And when the jubile of the children of Israel shall be, then shall their inheritance be put unto the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they are received: so shall their inheritance be taken away from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers.

verses.name: Numbers 36:5
verses.text: And Moses commanded the children of Israel according to the word of the Lord, saying, The tribe of the sons of Joseph hath said well.

verses.name: Numbers 36:6
verses.text: This is the thing which the Lord doth command concerning the daughters of Zelophehad, saying, Let them marry to whom they think best; only to the family of the tribe of their father shall they marry.

verses.name: Numbers 36:7
verses.text: So shall not the inheritance of the children of Israel remove from tribe to tribe: for every one of the children of Israel shall keep himself to the inheritance of the tribe of his fathers.

verses.name: Numbers 36:8
verses.text: And every daughter, that possesseth an inheritance in any tribe of the children of Israel, shall be wife unto one of the family of the tribe of her father, that the children of Israel may enjoy every man the inheritance of his fathers.

verses.name: Numbers 36:9
verses.text: Neither shall the inheritance remove from one tribe to another tribe; but every one of the tribes of the children of Israel shall keep himself to his own inheritance.

verses.name: Numbers 36:10
verses.text: Even as the Lord commanded Moses, so did the daughters of Zelophehad:

verses.name: Numbers 36:11
verses.text: For Mahlah, Tirzah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Noah, the daughters of Zelophehad, were married unto their father’s brothers’ sons:

verses.name: Numbers 36:12
verses.text: And they were married into the families of the sons of Manasseh the son of Joseph, and their inheritance remained in the tribe of the family of their father.

verses.name: Numbers 36:13
verses.text: These are the commandments and the judgments, which the Lord commanded by the hand of Moses unto the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.
